These measurement must perform within one week ( Day 14 Day 7 ) patient receives first dose AZD3965 . Laboratory Test Value require Haemoglobin ( Hb ) ≥ 9.0 g/dL ≥10.0 g/dL transfusion within last 4 week Absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) ≥ 1.5 x 10^9/L Platelet count ≥ 100 x 10^9/L Serum bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) ≤ 2.5 x ULN ≤ 5 x ULN presence liver metastases Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) ≤ 5.0 x ULN presence bone metastases Glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) Either : Calculated creatinine clearance Or : Isotope clearance measurement ( uncorrected ) ≥ 50 mL/min Prothrombin time < 1.5 x ULN Glucose ( fast ) < 7.8 mmol/L 5 .
